front.title: Simple Mobility and Multihoming Extensions for IKEv2 (SMOBIKE)

abstract.t: This document describes how existing NAT Traversal functionality could be leveraged to better support mobility and multihoming for IKEv2. The purpose is not to specify a finished solution, but rather to provide input for discussions in the MOBIKE WG. In particular, this draft raises questions to what extent the complexity present in the two other MOBIKE protocol proposals is actually necessary. These questions are not answered in this document, but are to be discussed in the MOBIKE WG.
